channel.title: [PI] HeLp PlEaSe!
channel.description:
Hey guys, Im using Hybrid PvP and i am attempting to add drops to this monster and the monster still dont drop Here is what i got in NpcDrops.TSM
#Cyclops 6269:1 537:30 7453:1 7454:1 7455:1 7456:1 7457:1 7458:1 7459:1 7460:1 7461:1 7462:1 989:1 989:1 995:40000000 995:15000000 995:80000000
I also tried this: #Cyclops 6269:100 537:30 7453:1 7454:1 7455:1 7456:1 7457:1 7458:1 7459:1 7460:1 7461:1 7462:1 989:1 989:1 995:40000000 995:15000000 995:80000000
Can anyone tell me why this monster is STILL not dropping ANYTHING AT ALL?
Thank you :D

item.title: [PI] HeLp PlEaSe!
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

hes not droping because your drop rate is at one.

Go to npcdrops.java ( src/server/model/npc/npcdrops.java) and raise the rates.

this is not delta pi uses npcdrops.tsm

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] HeLp PlEaSe!
item.dc:creator: @giveitup giveitup
item.description:
@giveitup wrote:

This is how npcdrops.TSM works…

100:10 995:100 995:200 995:300
995:1000

ok heres the legend:
NPCs ID
percentage droprate of the special drop which in this code its the 995:1000 this pretty much makes it 10 percent drop chance of getting the special drop 1000 coins (995 is coins)
Item Dropped ID
Amount of the item dropped
special drop that uses the 10 in the first line.
amount of the special item dropped… which is 1000 coins.

Dont use spaces. use the tab… so heres an example
always use enter to put in the special drop and go to the next line.

NPC ID:Rarity of Special Drop Item ID Dropped:Amount Dropped Item ID Dropped:Amount Dropped
Special Drop ID:Special Amount Dropped.

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
